page.title: 03EDUCATION, COLD ASHTON.
page.content: There are no schools in the area covered, the nearest being a{Primary school in Marshfield, 2 miles away and {Comprehensives}at Sir Bernard Lovell, Oldland and Kingsfield, Warmley, 5 miles distant, for which school buses are provided. A service bus runs to Bath where there are several comprehensives and private schools. {Pre-school}children can attend a Mothers and Toddlers Group, for under 3s,or a playgroup at Marshfield. These are voluntary groups paid for by parents. A few children go to private boarding school. {Adult Education}is provided by the Workers Education Association in Marshfield and by colleges in Bath and Kingswood. A mobile Library visits fortnightly. The families in the area seem satisfied with these facilities.
